code: var nextTodoId=0;export var addTodo=function addTodo(text,url){return{type:"ADD_TODO",id:nextTodoId++,text:text,url:url};};export var removeTodo=function removeTodo(id){return{type:"REMOVE_TODO",id:id};};export var setVisibilityFilter=function setVisibilityFilter(filter){return{type:"SET_VISIBILITY_FILTER",filter:filter};};export var toggleTodo=function toggleTodo(id){return{type:"TOGGLE_TODO",id:id};};export var VisibilityFilters={SHOW_ALL:"SHOW_ALL",SHOW_COMPLETED:"SHOW_COMPLETED",SHOW_ACTIVE:"SHOW_ACTIVE"};
